channel.title: Single Cell Devices – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: DigiFlavor Helix Kit
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Three output modes available: BLUE: 3.4V, GREEN: Bypass, RED: 3.2V
item.content:encoded:
Helix from DigiFlavor is a stylish, single 18650 starter kit inspired by the form of double-helix. Built with high grade ultra-lightweight ABS material which increases impact and heat resistance. Three power output modes are available to match your personal preference.

The LUMI is a pre-coiled sub ohm tank that is powered with our supermesh coil system (non-replaceable) to produce the best flavor and outstanding vapor production. LUMI is built with food grade PC and stainless steel and only weighs 16g.

LUMI is a pre-coiled tank that uses the supermesh coil system to produce high grade flavor, holds 4mL of juice capacity that is conveniently refillable from the top port.

Three output modes available; BLUE: 3.4V, GREEN: Bypass, RED: 3.2V.

USB Pass-through allows you to simultaneously use the device while charging.

The advance AS chipset fires extremely fast and stable.

Kit Includes:

  • 1 x Helix
  • 1 x LUMI tank
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x User manual
  • Spare Parts Pack

item.title: UWell Hypercar MOD
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description:
The Uwell Hypercar Box Mod is a single 18650 small hand held device! With its 5-80 watt power output you can run a wide variety of tanks on the Hypercar. …

UWell Hypercar MOD Read More »
item.content:encoded:
The Uwell Hypercar Box Mod is a single 18650 small hand held device! With its 5-80 watt power output you can run a wide variety of tanks on the Hypercar. It’s streamlined ergonomic design was modeled after a super car with different lengths, thickness, and density. With the simple and convenient power switch, it makes turning the device on and off a breeze.

Product Features:

  • Modes: Power mode, TC NI, TC SS, Bypass.
  • Low power alert.
  • Reverse battery protection.
  • Temperature protection.
  • Short circuit protection.
  • Resistance detection.
  • Overcharge protection.

Product Specifications:

  • Material: Zinc Alloy
  • Dimensions: 85.7 MM x 44.2 MM x 25.7 MM
  • Power Range: 5-80 Watts
  • Voltage Range: 0.7-8.0 Volts
  • Resistance Range: 0.1 – 3.0 ohms
  • Temperature Range: 200 – 600 F

Included in package:

  • 1 x Hypercar 80 watt device
  • 1 x Micro USB cable
  • 1 x User manual

item.title: Tesla Punk Mini 85
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
From Tesla comes the Punk Mini 85W TC Box Mod: A steampunk-style zinc alloy system built with transparent windows that reveal decorative industrial gear sets and patterned piping. Modest dimensions measuring 44mm x 30mm x 86mm, with a rapid-fire inlaid chipset capable of firing up to 85W and featuring various user output modes, including Temperature Control supporting Nickel 200 (Ni200), Titanium (Ti), and Stainless Steel (SS316) coils, Temperature Coefficient of Resistance Mode (TCR), and multiple taste modes as well (Normal, Soft, Hard, and User Preference). Memory mode can be programmed to remember personalized output graphs. Requires one high-amp 18650 battery (sold separately), and features a Micro USB charging port. Magnetic battery door provides easy access when changing batteries.

Features and Specifications: 

  • Dimensions: 44*30*86mm
  • Material: Zinc Alloy +ABS + PC
  • Cell Type: One Hi-Rate 18650 cell (discharged current should be above 35A)
  • Output Mode: KA/TC-SS316/ TC-Ni200/TC-Ti/TCR mode
  • Output voltage: 8.5V
  • Max Output Current: 30A
  • USB: 5V/1A
  • Taste Mode: Norm/Soft/Hard/User
  • Memory Mode: M1/M2/M3
  • Resistance Range: 0.1 – 3.0 ohm

item.title: JoyeTech Elitar Pipe Kit (GOLD)
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Sophisticated and elegant in appearance, It brings you back to the old days with its timeless classic design and premium finish!
item.content:encoded:
Classics never go out of style. Joyetech Elitar is cool, sophisticated and elegant in appearance. It brings you back to the old days with its timeless classic design and premium finish. Powered by single 18650 battery with 75W maximum output, Elitar presents a 0.66-inch OLED screen, having TC/VW/BYPASS/TCR modes available. Featuring an upgradeable firmware, the Elitar can perfectly satisfy you on a daily basis.

Classic combines with technology
Originated from the pipe, we combine it with Joyetech latest e-cigarette technology and make it into one mod
Simple and clear
Elitar features a 0.66-inch large OLED screen with all the parameters displayed. It is simple and clear to read, operate and vape.
Integrated design with premium finish
The screen and fire button are integrated with the Elitar Pipe, making it a totally pipe device. It is smooth and comfortable with its classic and premium finish.
Replaceable battery and magnetic cover
Elitar is power by single 18650 battery (sold Separately) with 75W maximum output wattage. The magnetic battery cover allows to replace the battery with ease.
We kindly recommend using high-rate 18650 battery with continuous discharge current (CDC) 25A
Intelligent temperature control system with multiple modes
Multiple modes are applied in the Elitar Pipe: power mode (VW), temperature control mode (TC-Ni/Ti/SS316), Bypass mode and TCR mode (TC-M1/M2/M3).
Product Specs:
Size: 38.00mm (W)*106.00mm (L)*36.50mm (H)
Diameter for the atomizer: 22.00mm
Output mode: VW/TC(Ti, Ni, SS316)/Bypass/TCR(M1, M2, M3)
Output Wattage: 1-75W
Resistance Range: 0.05-1.5ohm for TC/TCR mode
0.1-3.5ohm for VW/Bypass mode
Temperature Range: 100-315°C/ 200-600°F
Colors Available: Gold
Package Includes:
1 x Elitar Battery (without cell)
1 x Cubis Tank
2 x Cubis Coils
1 x USB Cable
1 x User Manual
2 x Warranty Card

item.title: KamryTech Kamry 60
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The Kamry 60W Temp-Control Mod is a strong and beautifully made device with high-tech capabilities. Made from high-end zinc alloy material, this mod not only looks good, but it is fully-equipped for your vaping needs. With this mod, you’re provided with a magnetic back cover and easy-to-access access battery replacement. The charging time for this device is 3-5 hours for a full charge. The Kamry 60W Temp. Control Mod protects you from overheating, short circuit protection and battery reverse connections. This mod matches with all RDA/RBA tanks OR DIY atomizers and is compatible with a 18650 battery.

Requires:

  • 1x Battery 18650 (sold separately)

Mod Features:

  • Input Voltage: 3.1V – 4.2V
  • Output Voltage: 0.3V – 9.0V
  • Max Output Current: 20A
  • Temperature Controlled Coil Resistance: 0.1 – 1ohm
  • Normal Coil Resistance: 0.16 – 2ohm
  • Adjustable Temperature Range: 200F – 600F
  • Wattage: 1W – 60W
  • Size: 81.5x45x 23mm

Package Contents:

  • 1x Kamry 60W Mod
  • 1x Kamry 60W Manual
  • 1x Warranty Card
  • 1x Cloth Bags
  • 1x Mic USB Charger

item.title: JoyetTech Ultex T80 Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Coil-less design utilizing an innovative NCFilm heater
item.content:encoded:
The Joyetech NCFilm heater along with the CUBIS Max tank. Being a coil-less design can be easily cleaned, thus supports a long lifespan. The CUBIS Max atomizer allows a simple replacement of cotton for a pure and delicate vaping experience. The ULTEX T80, a powerful vape pen style system is beautifully crafted. It’s powered by single replaceable 18650 battery (Sold Separately) paired with multiple output modes. A 0.49-inch OLED screen is placed on the lower end. This intuitive display presents you with everything you need. Having the top-fill and top-airflow system, you’re free of any leakage. Best at 40w, you can enjoy a huge but flavored clouds.

Kit Features:

  • Size: Φ28.0*138.5mm
  • Weight: 163.0g (no cell)
  • Battery using: single high rate 18650 cell (CDR ≥ 25A)
  • E-liquid capacity: 5.0ml
  • Heater: Joyetech NCFilm heater (Kanthal 0.25ohm)
  • Screen: 0.49 inch OLED display
  • Output: 1-80W
  • Modes: POWER/BYPASS/TEMP(NI/TI/SS)/TCR
  • Resistance range: 0.05-1.5ohm for TEMP/TCR mode
  • 0.05-3.5ohm for POWER mode
  • Coil-less design, innovative NCFilm heater
  • Huge clouds and optimal flavor
  • Long life span
  • Finely crafted, an integral whole
  • Powerful as mech mods
  • Filling with ease & Top airflow, avoid any leaks
  • Multi protections for safety vaping

Package Contents:

  • 1x ULTEX T80 (Battery Not Included)
  • 1x CUBIS Max atomizer
  • 1x NCFilm heater
  • 1x QC USB cable
  • 2x Manual
  • 1x Warranty card
  • 2x Warning card
  • 1x Spare parts Pack

item.title: Smok RPM 80 Pro Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Utilize RGC coils or RPM Coils!
item.content:encoded:
SMOK RPM 80 Pro Kit comes with 5ml e-liquid capacity, with an input voltage of 3.3V-4.2V and an output voltage of 0.8V-4.0V. It has a resistance of 1.3Ohm-2.5Ohm with maximum output wattage of 80W. It has short circuit protection, overheating protection and low battery warning which help in keeping safe for vaping. It is powered by a single 18650 battery (battery not included). It applies IQ-80 chip with RPM80 RPM/RGC Pod and the new RGC conical mesh coil which is SMOK’s first pod with adjustable bottom airflow.

Product Highlight

  • External Battery : 18650 (Battery not included)
  • Pod Capacity: 5ml/2ml
  • Size: 118 x 31.5 x 26 mm
  • Output voltage: 0.5-4.0V
  • Input voltages: 3.3V-4.2V
  • Output wattage: 1-80W
  • Resistance range: 0.1-2.5ohm
  • Charging output: 5V/2A

Package Content

  • 1 x RPM80 Pro Device (Battery not included)
  • 1 x RPM80 RPM Pod (RPM Mesh 0.4ohm Coil Pre-installed) (5ml)
  • 1 x RPM80 RGC Pod (RGC Conical Mesh 0.17ohm coil powered by nexmesh Preinstalled DC 0.6ohm Coil Pre-installed) (5ml)
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x User Manual

item.title: VandyVape Trident
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
WATERPROOF, DUSTPROOF & SHOCKPROOF!

The Trident Mod by Vandy Vape is a waterproof vape mod with silica gel surface. The mod is equipped with PCB board and has multiple protections to avoid potential risks. Powered by a single 18650 battery, the Trident can reach up to 100W. 

Main Features:

  • IP67 Waterproof.
  • Silica gel surface brings you a perfect grip.
  • Equipped with PCB board.
  • Single 18650 battery (Battery Not Included).

WATERPROOF – Silica gel material, IP67 waterproof extreme water, shock, and dust protections. Free from worry of rain damage or dropping it by accident.

INTELLIGENT LED DISPLAY, SHOWING CLEAR BATTERY POWER – The Trident Kit has LED display that shows you the exact battery power condition. When you start vaping, the current light gets brighter; the MOS tube controls output; the non-smoking LED is gradually extinguished when you stop vaping, and the MOS stops outputting. The three indicator colors on the switch button represent the various battery capacity.

  • Purple Light: ≥ 70% battery capacity ( > 3.66V)
  • Blue Light: ≥ 30-70% battery capacity ( > 3.48V)
  • Red Light > 30% battery capacity ( < 3.48V)
    • The Red Light will also flash 5 times once the voltage drops below 2.8V.

MULTIPLE PROTECTIONS – Provided to avoid potential risks including over-heating protection, short-circuit protection, battery management system, and a 10 second cut-off.

Specifications:

  • Size: 92mm x 27mm
  • Output Power: <100W
  • Working Voltage: 3.2-4.2V
  • Working Current: <35A
  • Output Voltage: 2.8-4.0V
  • Coil Resistance Range: 0.1-3Ω
  • Output Mode: Bypass
  • Standby Current: ≤ 10uA
  • G.W. (including package): 298g

BATTERY INSTALLATION – Open the battery cover by rotating on the bottom of the mod. Install one 18650 battery into the device according to the correct directions. Twist the battery cover back on.

Box Contents:

  • 1 x Trident Mod
  • 1 x User Manual

item.title: E Boss Pheonix 80W
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: The Phoenix or otherwise known as the Unicorn 80 Watt
item.content:encoded:
The Pheonix or otherwise known as the Unicorn 80 Watt Mod by E Boss is a nice light single battery device to have! With its 6 different designs one of them will be sure to catch your eye.

The Pheonix has a plethora of safety features built in including:

  • Time out protection
  • Short circuit protection
  • Overload protection
  • Reverse polarity protection
  • Low voltage protection
  • Over heating protection.

Product Specifications:

  • Mode: VW/NI/SS/TI/VB/CCW
  • Resistance range: 0.06-3.0Ω
  • Output Power: 5~80W
  • Battery: One 18650 required and sold separately

In the Package:

  • 1 x Unicorn Mod
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x User Manual

item.title: Smok Swag Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: SMOK BABY BEAST COIL COMPATIBLE
item.content:encoded:
The Vaporesso SWAG 80W TC Starter Kit is all the way authentic! The SWAG 80W TC Starter Kit promises 100% in authenticity, performance and brand. It is the most dynamic compact kit to date and offers exclusivity because of the incorporated vaulted OMNI 2.0 Board. The OMNI 2.0 Board is equipped with output settings with 80W of maximum output that coincides with the NRG SE Sub-Ohm Tank.

For starters, the SWAG 80W TC Box Mod comes with technologically advanced features that support In-Mould Labeling (IML); this is great for wear resistance. The SWAG mod is compact in size, making it perfect for traveling and portable usage. To add, the OMNI Board 2.0 comes with an output range of 5 to 80W and an array of output modes like Customized Curve of Wattage (CCW) and Customized Curve of Temperature (CCT). These distinctive modes provide an abundance of ranges and versatility. In CCW mode, you can customize the wattage output of the mod and boost the control every half second. In CCT mode, you can customize the temperature of your mod so you’re always in control of the temperature range. The SWAG 80W TC Box Mod also features Bypass Mode, Smart Variable Wattage Mode and TCR adjustments for additional standard methods of power. All of this information is displayed on the OLED screen which also provides real-time clock setting.

Not to be outdone, the NRG SE Sub-Ohm Tank has a 3.5ml e-Liquid capacity which means you can vape for hours before having to refill. When you do refill the tank, it is incredibly easy because of the twist-open fill design. This design reduces leaks, drips and spills. The NRG SE Sub-Ohm Tank is occupied with dual bottom airflow control and the utilization of GT Cores. Each set of GT cores is a 0.4ohm GT 2 Core with a maximum wattage of 80W and a GT cCell Core with a range of 20-35W. 

The Vaporesso SWAG 80W TC Starter Kit gets a portion of its power from a single high amp 18650 battery (sold separately). 

Requires:

  • 1x High-Amp 18650 Battery (Not Included)

Kit Features:
Vaporesso SWAG 80W TC Box Mod:

  • Dimensions: 75mm x 48mm x 25mm
  • Wattage Output Range: 5-80W
  • Temperature Control Range: 200-600F
  • Min Atomizer Resistance: 0.05ohm
  • Innovative OMNI Board 2.0 Chipset
  • Support Nickel, Titanium, and Stainless Steel Heating Elements
  • Temperature Coefficient of Resistance Adjustments (TCR)
  • Customized Curvature of Temperature (CCT)
  • Customized Curvature of Wattage (CCW)
  • Smart VW Mode
  • Bypass Mode
  • Real Time Clock Setting
  • Intuitive 0.91 Inch OLED Display
  • Durable Aluminum Alloy Construction
  • In-Mould Labeling (IML) Injection – High-Resistant
  • Top-Loaded Battery Cap – Threaded
  • MicroUSB Port – 2A Fast Charging
  • 510 Connection

Vaporesso NRG SE Sub-Ohm Tank: (SMOK BABY BEAST COMPATIBLE)

  • 22mm Diameter
  • Capacity: 3.5mL
  • Superior Stainlesss Steel Construction
  • Pyrex Glass Reinforcement
  • GT Cores – Features cCell Ceramic & Traditional Cotton
  • 0.3ohm GT cCell Core – rated for 25-40W
  • 0.4ohm GT 2 Core – rated for 45-80W
  • Smooth Dual Bottom Airflow Control
  • Twist Open Design – Convenient Top-Fill
  • Delrin Widebore Drip Tip
  • 510 Connection

Package Contents:

  • 1x SWAG 80W Mod
  • 1x NRG SE Sub-Ohm Tank
  • 1x 0.4ohm GT 2 Coil Head
  • 1x 0.5ohm GT cCell Coil Head
  • 1x Replacement Glass Tube
  • 1x MicroUSB Cable
  • 1x Instructional Manual
